WellnessObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

WellnessObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

WellnessObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Worker_Wellness_Data_Data.description: The effective date for the Worker Wellness Data. When present this date applies to all the Wellness fields.

WorkerObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

WorkerObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

WorkerObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Worker_Wellness_Data_Data.description: The worker for the Wellness Data.

DependentObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

DependentObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

DependentObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Worker_Wellness_Data_Data.description: The dependent for the Wellness Data.
Date when worker or dependent participated in a Wellness Program.
Whether worker participates in a Wellness Program for the Worker Wellness Data.
The score for the Worker Wellness Data.

description: Contains the Worker Wellness Data data.

validation.validation: Effective date must be empty when Wellness Score Date or Participates in Wellness Date or Uses Tobacco Date are not. Conversely when Effective date is not empty, Wellness Score Date, Participates in Wellness Date and Uses Tobacco  Date must be empty.
Dependent is not eligible for Wellness.
